developer: BULSTRAD LIFE VIENNA INSURANCE GROUP EAD
description:
Безплатното мобилно приложение B-Assist е разработено специално за клиенти на Булстрад Живот Виена Иншурънс Груп със застраховка „Здравна грижа”. Сега то е актуализирано и с по-богата функционалност, която пести време и усилия. 
B-Assist e супер асистент, който винаги e подръка. 

С приложението B-Assist можете да:
 - Заявявате удобно възстановяване на направени медицински разходи. 
 - Записвате лесно час за преглед при специалист. 
 - Изпратите заявка за потвърждение  на високоспециализирани изследвания.
 - Генерирате виртуално копие на Вашата лична идентификационна карта за застраховка „Здравна грижа“ по всяко време. 
 - Правите справки за покритието по вашата застраховка „Здравна грижа”.
 - Разполагате с важна информация за заведени застрахователни претенции и ползвани услуги. 
 - Ползвате актуална карта с лечебните заведения от мрежата на Булстрад Живот Виена Иншурънс Груп.
откриете допълнителна полезна информация.

Healee connects you with a doctor to get a reliable advice directly from your phone or tablet, regardless of where you are and when you need it. Forget having to wait months to see a specialist, skip the crowded waiting room, and speak with top doctors now!
You can also keep a comprehensive health record to better understand your symptoms.

FEATURES
***********************
- Find the right doctor
Healee is used by thousands of doctors, with various specialties and rich expertise. Find and connect with the doctor who is right for you. You can then share symptoms, complaints, lab results and medical images, and ask for consultations.

- Track your health
We let you store and manage all your past and present symptoms and conditions, log treatments, set medication schedules and reminders, check drug and allergy interactions, upload lab results and images, and explore your health data using a set of visual charts and reports. The feature integrates with Apple's HealthKit.

- Share with people like you
The best advice about a health condition often comes from other people in the same boat as you. You can easily and safely share your data on health forums and communities, to ask for people's help and advice.

- Get timely advice from selected doctors
If you need timely medical attention, a team of approved doctors is always at your disposal, with a guaranteed response time. You can now talk to doctors within 8 specialties, and we will be gradually adding more.

FAQs
***********************
- How do I talk to a doctor via Healee?
You can browse a list of doctors, with various specialties and expertise. Once you find the doctor you need, you can request an online consultation.
If the doctor you need is not on the list, you can invite her to join Healee. The platform allows you to connect and stay in touch with your own doctor, or any other doctor you choose. 
In addition, you can request an online consultation from a selected team of approved doctors, with a guaranteed response time. You can now talk to doctors within 8 specialties, and we will be gradually adding more.

- How do doctor consultations work?
Once you connect with a doctor, you can describe your problem and ask for an online consultation. Ahead of the consultation, the doctor may ask you to provide additional info – your medical history, lab results, images. The doctor will respond with information about your condition, together with treatment advice.
If you cannot find the doctor you need, you can request an online consultation from a selected team of approved doctors. In this case, you send a description of your problem, and you get a response from one of the doctors, within 16 to 48 hours, depending on what delivery priority you choose. 

- Is my personal and medical information safe?
Both your health and privacy are our top priorities.
Even we do not have access to any sensitive personal data that can potentially identify you. We do not have access to your email address, and the images and messages you exchange with doctors. All this data is stored encrypted on our servers and apart from you, only doctors have access to it.

- Can doctors prescribe medications through Healee?
Yes. If during the consultation, the doctor decides that you need a certain medicine, he or she can write you a prescription for that medicine. If you already have not done so when registering, you will be asked to provide your full name and age. Depending on your local regulations, this information is necessary for preparing a valid prescription.

Download the world's leading pregnancy tracker app today, for free week-by-week pregnancy information and articles!

The Pregnancy+ app features expert advice, daily articles, healthcare tips and interactive 3D models so you can track your baby's development. Our pregnancy app has been downloaded over 80 million times by expecting families. Join our worldwide community today! 

Baby Development
► Unique, interactive 3D models showing your baby's development 
► Baby Size Guide helps you visualise your baby's size in fruits, animals & sweets
► Pregnancy Week-by-Week Guides explain what to expect in each pregnancy week
► Simple & informative Pregnancy Timeline highlighting important milestones

Pregnancy Guides & Information

► Daily Pregnancy Articles, tailored to your pregnancy stage
► 2D & 3D Scans by pregnancy week for you to browse
► Daily Blog Posts with tips, tricks & helpful advice

► Kick Counter tracks your baby's movements & activity

Organise & Plan

► Hospital Bag helps you prepare your hospital visit, for Mother, Birth Partner & Baby

► To-Do List & Baby Shopping List for ideas of what you need to do & buy

Our EXCLUSIVE 3D Models
Enjoy our unique 3D models showing your pregnancy's week-by-week development, from blastocyst to foetus to baby. Our 3D models truly help you to connect with the baby growing inside you. 
► Choose from multiple ethnicities
► Zoom in or out & rotate to see the baby's intricate detail
► Watch guided pregnancy week-by-week walk-throughs

Pregnancy Articles & Guides
If you're feeling overwhelmed by all the advice out there, don't worry. Our Pregnancy + tracker app will guide you through your pregnancy, week-by-week, keeping you up to date with your baby's development and helping you stay healthy through pregnancy and beyond. The Pregnancy+ app content is written in-house, with the help of medical experts, lactation consultants, midwives and, of course, parents.

Share your journey with friends & family

Clinical Decision Support for Healthcare Professionals (NPI Required).

OpenEvidence is the world’s leading medical information platform for health care professionals, providing accurate and efficient answers at the point of care. Every answer on OpenEvidence is always sourced, cited, and grounded in the peer-reviewed medical literature.

Now featuring New England Journal of Medicine (NEJM) published content, NEJM multimedia content, and NEJM invited review articles authored by the world’s leading clinical experts.

• 160 medical specialties
• 1,000+ diseases and therapeutic areas
• 1m+ medical topics

Trusted by medical professionals at 10,000+ care centers across the United States.

OpenEvidence is only available for health care professionals. Users must verify their health care professional status before using OpenEvidence.

AS SEEN IN

Forbes: “OpenEvidence Keeps Doctors Up To Date On The Latest Science”

TESTIMONIALS

“I've been using OpenEvidence for the last week - it has been amazing! Able to narrow down on results quickly and find information that I wasn't able to do with Google/PubMed searches on my own.” - Dr. John Lee, MD. Physician & Faculty Member, Harvard Medical School

“OpenEvidence can be the foundational technology to power all clinical decision tools.” - Dr. Antonio Jorge Forte, MD. Director of MayoExpert, Mayo Clinic

“OpenEvidence is more up-to-date than UpToDate. And more useful regardless, since it’s interactive, and you can ask it questions, and get very specific answers about specific medical fact patterns in a patient case. It’s like having a curbside consult with a team of expert physicians, but that you can carry around with you in your pocket.” - Dr. Ram Dandillaya, MD. Clinical Chief, Department of Cardiology, Cedars-Sinai Medical Center

“I am in community practice and medical director of a community cancer center. OpenEvidence has been an incredible lifeline for daily practitioners.” - C.J., Oncologist 

“OpenEvidence is absolutely fantastic. I use it a gazillion times a day.” - J.A., Neurologist

“OpenEvidence’s efforts to make medicine more evidence-based are invaluable. The shift from judgment to calculation can reduce the level of noise currently found in medicine.” - Daniel Kahneman, Nobel Prize Laureate (In Memoriam)

“It is light years ahead of the next best medical oriented AI I have used.” - R.E.., Oncologist

STAY SHARP & UP-TO-DATE

• Find what you need, when you need it on a mobile-native platform.

• The world’s most powerful medical search engine at your fingertips.

• Discover and find exactly what you are looking for with deep search and a highly intuitive user interface that understands you and what you are asking.

Discover one of the top pregnancy tracker apps designed specifically for women and expecting parents. This application will keep you calm throughout your pregnancy, providing daily insights into your baby's development and your own health. It will let you know what’s happening with you and your unborn baby—week after week—and offer guidance on how to handle new situations. New, helpful articles are posted every day to support your pregnancy journey!




Keep track of your weight, blood pressure, tummy growth, baby's first movements, and contractions with our advanced tracking tools. Save all your important data in a single, easy-to-share report for your doctor, ensuring your pregnancy progress is well-documented.


May your pregnancy be pleasant and wonderful! Our app provides the tools and resources expecting parents need to feel confident and prepared.



The Most Interesting Features of the App:
- Convenient Calendar: Schedule tests and doctor visits effortlessly.  

- Pregnancy Diary: Use this tracker to log your weight, tummy size, blood pressure, mood, and sexual activity daily. Never miss appointments or key tests.  

- Weekly Baby Development Updates: Find out when your baby becomes the size of a grapefruit, grows eyelashes, or when you can discover their gender. Get nutritional and lifestyle advice tailored for women and their babies.  

- Daily Articles: Access a wealth of resources and tools with professional advice to help women navigate emotions, relationships, and health during pregnancy.  

- Doctor Report: Compile all your tracking data into a comprehensive report, available as a PDF or on your phone, to share with your doctor.  

- Checklists and To-Do Lists: Stay organized with trimester-specific checklists and to-do lists—perfect for expecting parents.  

- Smart Gestational Age Calculator: Trusted by top medical professionals, this tool calculates fetal and obstetric terms with pinpoint accuracy.  

- Kegel Exercises: Prepare for childbirth with guided exercises, an essential tool for women’s health during pregnancy.  

- Contraction Counter: This intelligent tracker distinguishes real contractions from practice ones, ensuring you and your baby are ready for delivery.  

- Health App Synchronization: Securely save your pregnancy tracking data with seamless integration.


We’ve worked hard to create one of the best apps for expectant mothers. Send your feedback to team@wachanga.com (mailto:team@wachanga.com)—we’re here to support women and parents every step of the way.



GOLD STATUS IN THE APP

- Private Policy - https://wachanga.com/privacy
- Terms of Use - https://wachanga.com/terms

Вашият личен здравен асистент – директно в телефона ви!
С нашето приложение получавате бърз и сигурен достъп до всички основни услуги, предлагани от здравното заведение. Спестете време и усилия, като управлявате своето здраве удобно, където и да се намирате.

Запазване на часове:
  Лесно и интуитивно записване на прегледи при лекари специалисти.
  Виждате свободните часове в реално време и избирате най-подходящия за вас.
  Получавате напомняния и известия за предстоящите ви визити.

Лабораторни резултати:
  Преглед на резултатите от лабораторни изследвания веднага след готовност.
  История на изследванията – проследявайте здравето си с времето.
  Изтегляне и споделяне на резултатите в PDF формат.

Онлайн плащания:
  Платете прегледи и изследвания директно през приложението с дебитна/кредитна карта.
  Получавате електронна разписка и история на всички извършени плащания.
  Сигурна и защитена среда за финансови транзакции.

Достъп до медицинска информация:
  Преглед на медицинската ви история, епикризи и назначения.
  Данни за минали посещения, предписани терапии и изследвания.
  Всичко необходимо – на едно място, лесно достъпно и организирано.

Известия и напомняния:
  Получавате важни съобщения от болницата – нови услуги, профилактични кампании и др.
  Персонализирани известия според вашия здравен профил.

Сигурност и поверителност:
  Достъп чрез сигурна регистрация с мобилен номер, имейл или биометрични данни.
  Личните ви здравни данни са защитени според всички стандарти и нормативни изисквания.

Приложението е създадено с мисъл за пациента – интуитивно, лесно за използване и съобразено с нуждите на съвременния човек. Подобрете комуникацията си със здравното заведение и бъдете информирани и спокойни за своето здраве, навсякъде и по всяко време.

A true and totally 3D app for studying human anatomy, built on an advanced interactive 3D touch interface.

Features:

- Remove estructures to reveal the anatomical structures below them.
- 3D location quizzes to test your knowledge
- Switch on/off different anatomy systems
- Both male and female reproductive systems are available

Contents:
- Bones
- Ligaments
- Joints
- Muscles
- Circulation (arteries, vein and heart)
- Central nervous system
- Peripheral nervous system
- Sense organs
- Respiratory
- Digestive
- Urinary
- Reproductive ( both male and female)

Diabetes goes where you go, now your glucose readings can too, with the Dexcom ONE+ Continuous Glucose Monitoring (CGM) system and mobile app†.  
With the Dexcom ONE+ mobile app†, users can access their real-time glucose readings at a glance and set customisable alerts that can help warn of highs and lows, all with no finger pricks* or scanning. Discuss with your healthcare professional how you should use the information displayed on the Dexcom ONE+ to help manage your diabetes.
 
The Dexcom ONE+ mobile app† has been designed with enhanced features to help in the management of diabetes: 
•	The app-led onboarding allows users get started in a few clicks only. 
•	Share your glucose data with up to 10 followers who can monitor your glucose data and trends on their compatible smart device with the Dexcom Follow app. Share and Follow functions require an internet connection. 
•	Key diabetes metrics displayed in the Clarity Card section of the mobile app, so that users can see both real-time and retrospective glucose data.** 
•	Event logging where users can track activities like meal intake, exercise sessions and insulin injections, helping them better understand their glucose patterns.1 
•	Alerts to notify users 12-hours before the end of a sensor session, so you can change your sensor when it’s convenient for you.1  
 
Apple Watch: 
•	View your glucose information, trend graph, and alerts right from your wrist with the Dexcom ONE+ Apple Watch app. Watches require compatible smart device to use app. 
 
Learn more at Dexcom.com. 
 
This app is only for use with the Dexcom ONE+ Continuous Glucose Monitoring System. 
 
*If your glucose alerts and readings from the Dexcom ONE+ do not match symptoms or expectations, use a blood glucose meter to make diabetes treatment decisions 
† Smart device sold separately. For a list of compatible devices, visit www.dexcom.com/compatibility. 
**An internet connection is required for patients to send their glucose data to Dexcom Clarity via a compatible smart device: dexcom.com/compatibility. 
1 Dexcom ONE+ User Guide, 2023.

*** Most downloaded Contraction Timer app in the world! Number 1 in the UK, USA, Australia, Canada, Italy and elsewhere! ***

This is the simplest-to-use contraction timer. The app will help to track your contractions and determine when it's time to go to the hospital.
If you plan on having a home birth, the app will tell you what stage of labor you are in at any given moment.

Keep track of your labor by tapping a single button at the start and at the end of each contraction. The Contraction Timer analyzes the duration and frequency of contractions and will notify you when it's time to go to the hospital.

Thousands of pregnant women around the world have become mothers using our app.

Always consult your doctor to orient yourself in terms of contraction frequency and duration.
This app is not a medical device and our recomendations are based on standard indicators. Your labor may occur differently. Therefore, do not rely exclusively on our app.
If the duration and frequency of contractions do not yet correspond to the necessary indicators but labor pains become unbearable, it is better to go to the hospital as soon as possible rather than give birth at home or on the way there. Trust what your body is telling you.

If you have any questions or suggestions, please email us at neumandev@gmail.com. Your feedback is very important to us.

developer: MUTLU ISLER TEKNOLOJI VE ILETISIM HIZMETLERI TICARET LTD STI
description:
Mutlu anne, ücretsiz olarak indirebileceğiniz kullanımı oldukça basit bir hamilelik ve gebelik takip uygulamasıdır. 
Bebek planlıyorum özelliği ile artık hamile kalma sürecindeki kadınların da kullanımı için uygundur.

Uygulamada yer alan zengin görsellerle bebeğinizin gelişimini günlük olarak takip edebileceğiniz Mutlu Anne, bu heyecanlı serüveninizde her zaman yanınızda olacak hamilelik rehberiniz olacaktır.

Son adet tarihinizi veya bebeğinizin tahmini doğum tarihini uygulamaya girerek hamilelik takibinizi kolayca başlatabilirsiniz.

Uygulamada Bulabileceğiniz Özellikler:
● Hem anne hem de bebek için ayrı olarak hazırlanmış günlük bilgiler
● Günlük olarak bebeğinizden gelecek eğlenceli bildirimler ve işinize yarayacak faydalı bilgilendirme mesajları
● Bebeğinizin ağzından gönderilen, sizin de cevap vererek bebeğinize kavuşmadan onunla sohbet etmenizi sağlayacak birbirinden eğlenceli mesajlar. İsterseniz bebeğinizin mesajını ve sizin cevabınızı sevdiklerinizle de paylaşabilirsiniz
● Diğer annelerle bilgi paylaşımı yapabileceğiniz, kafanıza takılan soruları sorabileceğiniz ve hatta uzman görüşü alabileceğiniz forum platformu
● Blog menüsü altında yer alan farklı kategorilerde, hamilelere özel olarak hazırlanan günlük içerikler
● Bebeğine isim seçmekte zorlanan anneler için binlerce isimden ve isimlerin anlamından oluşan bir liste içerisinden çarkı döndürerek rastgele bebeğinize isim seçebilme fırsatı
● Bebeğinizin tekme sayısını ve tekme aralıklarını ölçebileceğiniz ve kaydedebileceğiniz ücretsiz tekme sayar
● Güncel kilonuzu kaydedebileceğiniz ve kilonuzdaki değişimleri gözlemleyebileceğiniz kilo takibi bölümü
● Bebeğin ve annenin ihtiyaç duyacağı tüm malzemelerin ve doğum çantanızda olması gereken malzemelerin listesi
● Hislerinizi, anılarınızı ve bebeğinize söylemek istediğiniz tüm düşüncelerinizi yazabileceğiniz bebeğime notlar bölümü
● Sağlıklı bir hamilelik dönemi geçirmeniz için yaptırmanız gereken testlerin listesine ulaşabileceğiniz sağlık testleri bölümü
● Hamileliğiniz boyunca almanız gereken ilaçları ekleyerek isteğinize göre hatırlatıcı koyabileceğiniz ilaç takibi bölümü
Kolayca hamileliğinizi organize ederek kendinize notlar tutabileceğiniz takvim bölümü
● Bebeğinizin fotoğraflarını aylara göre düzenleyerek anılarınızı her daim yanınızda taşımanızı sağlayacak albüm bölümü
● Üstelik her ay düzenlediğimiz çekilişler ile annelerimizi mutlu etmeye devam ediyoruz

Mutlu Anne, hamilelik rehberi uygulaması ile harika bir 280 gün geçirmeniz temennisiyle!

YOUR ULTIMATE DIGITAL HEALTH RECORD

Medrec:M helps you to collect, track, and analyze all the key information about your or your loved one's condition. Connect with doctors remotely, optimize your health data storage and take care of your health to a new level.

With Medrec:M mobile app you no longer need to worry about
    - losing important medical documents
    - remembering when to take medications
    - forgetting symptoms details
    - waiting in line at the doctor's office

The application makes recording symptoms like fever, cough, and other vital data easy. This helps decrease the time for a diagnosis and finding the right treatment for an illness.

Keep a full record of your medical history by uploading important documents such as diagnoses, prescriptions, lab results, x-rays, and more.

Connect with doctors through online appointments or chat. Receive medical advice without leaving your home, saving you time and effort.

Share important health data with your doctor before the consultation. This can be symptom details, medical records, charts and statistics on health vitals, and more.

Create a secondary profile for a relative, either a child or an elderly, and keep a detailed diary of their health data.

MAIN FEATURES

- Online Consultations with Doctors
Book an appointment through the app and connect with a medical professional from the comfort of your home via video call or chat.

- Medication Plans & Pill Reminders
Create a detailed medication plan for you or your family members, with options to track inventory and set pill reminders.

- Store Medical Documentation
Keep all your medical documents available in a secure place, with the option to quickly share them with your doctor.

- Detailed Logbook
The detailed logbook provides a clean diary of all your entries in one place, helping you log, review and analyze essential information regarding your health.

- Track Symptoms and Health Vitals
Log all current symptoms to build an overview of how a health issue progresses day by day as well as important vitals such as blood pressure, blood oxygen saturation, and more.

- Analytical Charts
Visually summarize all your collected data using easy-to-read charts and diagrams.

- Share Data with your Medical Team
Help them spot reoccurring trends, therapy progress, or the need for medication alteration.

Communication between a doctor and a patient has never been so easy!
Consento connects you with your doctor and with many other physicians.

Consento gives you:

  • Maintaining health information for your entire family in one place
  • A digital health record for each member of the family
  • Appointment booking with your GP or with other physicians 
  • Online consultations with a doctor - written or by phone - 24 hours a day / 7 days a week
  • Notifications of upcoming appointments or uploaded documents in your dossier 
  • Ability to upload to the dossier and read out laboratory results
  • A personal diary of the patient with the possibility of follow-up by a doctor
  • An e-wallet with credits that you receive as bonuses from doctors or to buy yourself
  • GDPR-compliant personal data management


Consento vision is to provide a modern information platform for health models, data and services for this to bring together all stakeholders responsible for people's healthcare - doctors, medical and healthcare professionals administrative staff, patients and parents. We believe to be a leader in cloud-based healthcare platforms in 21st century for Bulgaria and Europe.

Keep yourself and loved ones safe and never forget to take your meds again with Medisafe, the easy-to-use app ranked #1 by pharmacists to help you remember when to take your pills.

Don't put yourself or your loved ones at risk by missing a dosage -- or taking a double dose because nobody tracked. Our mission is giving people the tools, support and information they need to take their medications the way they're supposed to.

Pharmacists rank Medisafe #1 out of 461 apps they've tested, and MyVCM has recognized Medisafe for HIPAA "leadership and best practices in managing security and compliance."

That's why millions have downloaded Medisafe, the top-rated medication manager and pill reminder for those who need reminders to take meds, fertility drugs, birth control, and other medicines.

Download Medisafe and start managing your medications, pills, refills, drug interactions, measurements and doctors' appointments to improve your health. Medisafe is the best pill tracker and planner on the App Store. Never forget to take your medications again! 

Also featured on Fox TV, ABC, Mashable, Inc. Magazine, Los Angeles Times, Boston Globe, Life Hacker, Fast Company, TechCrunch, and many more.

Here's why Medisafe is the best:
CLEAN & SIMPLE: Visual and easy medical manager to handle drug reminders.
HEALTH APP INTEGRATION: Keeps track of your measurements and syncs them to the HealthKit app: blood glucose, blood pressure, weight, pulse and temperature.
REPORT SHARING: See your progress report and send it to the doctor or nurse as a visual informative PDF.
FAMILY INTERACTION: Synchronizes the family's medicine pillboxes to one place, in real time. Manage your entire family from one account!
MEDTONES: Various Medtones to make Medisafe playful and a great addition to your day: have President Obama, Darth Vader, Dr Evil, Austin Powers, Elsa or your Nagging Mom remind you about your meds. Choose your medication reminder sound to make Medisafe a comfortable addition to your day.
REMINDERS: Reminds you to take medication doses on time every time, even if your device is asleep. Medisafe has timezone support too! No need to worry while traveling, your reminders are always on time.
REFILL REMINDER: Rx refill reminds you when you need to restock your prescriptions.
PRN FRIENDLY: List PRN (on demand) medication.

Whether you are taking one drug dosage or more, you know how difficult it is remembering each pill right on time. If you are a caretaker for a child, parent, or patient suffering from chronic pain or illness, you know how stressful it is not knowing for sure if your loved one took their medications correctly.

Medisafe does not provide medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding your medications or a medical condition.

Pharmacists Rank Medisafe #1: http://bit.ly/2nTjmsI

Please don’t hesitate to contact us: support@medisafe.com 

Thanks,
Medisafe Team

This app is freely downloadable, however in-app purchase is required to unlock the contents. 
The complete Skeletal System and a few other contents are always freely accessible enabling you to try the app properly.

"Anatomy 3D Atlas" allows you to study human anatomy in an easy and interactive way. 
Through a simple and intuitive interface it is possible to observe every anatomical structure from any angle.
The anatomical 3D models are particularly detailed and with textures up to 4k resolution.

The subdivision by regions and the predefined views facilitate the observation and the study of single parts or groups of systems and the relationships between different organs.

"Anatomy - 3D Atlas" is an application aimed at medical students, doctors, physiotherapists, paramedics, nurses, athletic trainers and in anyone interested in deepening their knowledge of human anatomy.
This app is a fantastic tool to complement classic human anatomy books.

ANATOMICAL 3D MODELS
• Musculoskeletal system
• Cardiovascular system
• Nervous system
• Respiratory System
• Digestive System
• Urogenital system (male and female)
• Endocrine system
• Lymphatic system
• Eye and ear system

FEATURES
• Simple and intuitive interface
• Rotate and zoom each model in 3D space
• Option to hide or isolate single or multiple selected models
• Filter to hide or display each system
• Search function to easily find every anatomical part
• Bookmark function to save custom views
• Smart rotation which moves the center of rotation automatically
• Transparency function
• Visualization of muscles through levels of layers from the superficial ones down to the deepest ones
• By selecting a model or a pin, the related anatomical term shows up
• Description of the muscles: origin, insertion, innervation and action
• Show/Hide UI interface (very useful with small screens)

MULTILINGUAL
• The anatomical terms and the user interface are available in 12 languages: Latin, English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Chinese, Japanese, Korean and Turkish
• The anatomical terms can be displayed in two languages simultaneously

developer: MBAL ZA ZHENSKO ZDRAVE - NADEZHDA OOD
description:
В мобилното приложение на болница „Надежда”  можете да се възползвате от редица полезни функционалности и бърз достъп до важна информация, свързана с Вашите прегледи, консултации, медицински процедури, хоспитализации и изследвания.  Имате възможност да записвате час, да достъпвате информация за предстоящи и минали посещения, лабораторни резултати, плащания, финансови справки, да извършвате преглед на различни документи:  амбулаторни листове, епикризи, рецепти. След преминаване на преглед или консултация, както и след изписването Ви от болницата, имате възможност да оцените специалистите ни и качеството на предоставената Ви услугата. 

Многопрофилна болница за активно лечение  „Надежда“ е водещо лечебно заведение в столицата на България – София, което предлага качествени медицински грижи на европейско ниво за цялото семейство.
Болница „Надежда“ печели доверието на пациентите си благодарение на опитния екип от специалисти и уютната и модерна обстановка, индивидуалния подход и умението на всеки един от лекарите да си взаимодейства и работи съвместно с всички останали специалисти и звена в болницата за намиране на оптимален подход при лечението. 

Отделения:
•	Инвитро център
•	Отделение по Гинекология и онкогинекология
•	Отделение по Пренатална диагностика и терапия
•	Родилно отделение
•	Отделение по Неонатология
•	Хирургично отделение
•	Отделение по Анестезиология и интензивно лечение
•	Отделение по Образна диагностика
•	 Медицинска онкология.

8 високотехнологично оборудвани лаборатории:
•	Клинична лаборатория
•	Имунологична лаборатория
•	Генетична лаборатория
•	Микробиологична лаборатория
•	Вирусологична лаборатория
•	Патохистологична лаборатория
•	Ембриологична лаборатория
•	Андрологична лаборатория 

Диагностично-консултативните кабинети в болницата и в медицинския център са: 
•	Акупунктура
•	Вътрешни болести
•	Гастроентеролог
•	Генетик
•	Гинеколог
•	Дерматолог
•	Диетолог
•	Ендокринолог
•	Естетична гинекология
•	Ехомамография
•	Кардиолог
•	Кърмене
•	Невролог
•	Нефролог
•	Образна диагностика
•	Онколог
•	Ортопед 
•	Педиатър
•	Пренатална диагностика
•	Проследяване на бременност
•	Пулмолог
•	Психолог
•	Психиатър
•	Рехабилитация и физиотерапия
•	Скрининг менопауза
•	Съдов хирург

Easy Anatomy is your ultimate guide to learning human anatomy!

Master anatomy faster and more effectively with our interactive 3D Atlas, flashcards, study notes, and expert-made videos. Perfect for medical students, athletes, artists, and anyone who wants to truly understand the human body.

High-detail 3D Atlas
Explore anatomically accurate male and female models with over 11,000 structures. Study every system of the body — from the skeleton to blood vessels — with maximum precision. Intuitive navigation makes it easy to focus on what really matters: knowledge.

16,000+ Illustrated Flashcards
Bright, clear illustrations designed for quick memorization. Reinforce learning with engaging quizzes. Flashcards cover all major systems, great for daily practice or exam prep.

3D Quizzes
Test yourself directly on the 3D model by finding and identifying structures — a powerful way to reinforce your memory that no other atlas offers.

500+ Expert Study Notes
Concise and to the point. Mind maps, charts, and summaries make even the toughest topics easier to grasp.

Videos
Not just lectures. Each video is a carefully crafted story where complex topics are broken down into simple parts, supported by illustrations and animations.

Fitness & Motion
See how muscles work in motion. Learn proper technique execution, improve biomechanics, and avoid mistakes with detailed 3D animations.

Our mission is to make anatomy accessible, engaging, and practical for learners everywhere. We keep improving the app, listening to your feedback, and adding new features to help you study more effectively.

Download Easy Anatomy today and start learning more effectively!

You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal in your iTunes account settings. Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited once a premium subscription is purchased.

The most popular and innovative app of its kind, SnoreLab records, measures and tracks your snoring and helps you to discover effective ways to reduce it.

SnoreLab has monitored more than 50 million nights of sleep and has helped millions of people to better understand or even eliminate their snoring problem.

The app is very easy to use: simply set SnoreLab running next to your bed whilst you sleep. In the morning you will discover your Snore Score, exactly when and how loudly you snored, and listen to some highlights!

SnoreLab lets you log and track lifestyle factors and any snoring remedies so you can see how they impact your snoring.

SnoreLab is attracting endorsements from doctors, dentists and users alike. The app can be useful in medical consultations when investigating sleep disorders such as sleep apnea.

Are you a room shaker or a snorter? A buzz saw or a whistler? Or do you just purr like a kitten? Discover the truth with SnoreLab! What's your Snore Score?

'An ingenious app' - Mail Online

'Best Health App - Runner-up' - Best App Ever Awards 2014

FEATURES:
▷ Snore Detection: Identifies snoring using advanced algorithms.
▷ Snore Recording: Captures sound samples of your snoring throughout the night.
▷ Snore Score: Measures snoring intensity to help you track your snoring over time.
▷ Breathing Analysis: BreathFlow™, SnoreLab’s unique measure of breathing stability correlated with apnea severity, analyzes sound patterns to detect indicators of irregular breathing. 
▷ Breathing Rate: Tracks your respiratory rate and identifies possible breathing interruptions.
▷ Nightly Comparison: See how your snoring changes from night to night.
▷ Remedy Testing: Measure how snoring remedies or lifestyle changes affect your results.
▷ Lifestyle Impact Tracking: Understand how factors like alcohol influence your snoring.
▷ Apple Health Integration: Syncs sleep and body stats seamlessly with Apple Health.
▷ Sleep Stats & Trends: Records detailed sleep metrics for better insights.
▷ Full-Night Recording: Continuous snore recording for deeper analysis.
▷ Share Recordings: Email snore sound files easily.
▷ Expert Remedies: Explore tips and information about effective snoring solutions.
▷ Simple & Intuitive: Easy to set up and use every night.

AWARDS:
▷ Top 10 Medical app in 30 countries
▷ "What's Hot" medical app in 33 countries
▷ Featured in Lifehacker, The Sunday Times, The Guardian, Quantified Self and others

SnoreLab has an average rating of 4.7 stars from over 10,000 user reviews. Here is a selection of some of our favourite reviews:

"This app is wonderful in that not only does it work, but its ease of use. This is a simple, effective tool to better health."

"Excellent app. This helped me to reduce my snoring by applying some of the remedies listed. My wife and I thank you, especially my Wife!"

"Take it from an MD... This program works and is a very useful tool to share with your doctor."

"SnoreLab is the best sleep recorder I have tried. My snoring is down 40 plus percent in just two weeks."

Мобильное приложение «КАРАТ-ЭКСПЕРТ», создано на базе ранее успешно реализованного приложения «Карат». Основное его отличие состоит в том, что разработчики в этом приложении предложили пользователям решение, которое составлено на основании хорошо известной представителям медицинского сообщества МКБ-10. Кроме того алгоритмы лечения включают теперь весь спектр лекарственной терапии при различных заболеваниях. 

Как и прежде алгоритмы составлены на основании данных клинических рекомендаций, первоисточники которых указаны в каждом алгоритме. Алгоритмизированное приложение составлено по принципу пошагового подведения пользователя к решению поставленной задачи – оптимального диагностического поиска и/или выбору оптимальной терапии при установленном диагнозе и дополнительных критериях .

Важно!
«КАРАТ-ЭКСПЕРТ» является справочной информационной системой рационального выбора терапии, предназначенной ИСКЛЮЧИТЕЛЬНО для врачей. Если Вы не являетесь квалифицированным специалистом здравоохранения, убедительно просим Вас не устанавливать данное приложение и не пользоваться представленной системой.
